CustomField.description: Export Quote field will be displayed in Quote Actions Lightning Components
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Expired',TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Closed(not won)'),IF(Roll_Up_Of_Proposal_Line_Item__c >0,IF( Reprice_In_Progress__c = true, null, IF(Quote_Type__c <> 'Direct CPQ', IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM',('/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Export Quote'),(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & '/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Export Quote&mode=touchless&outputType=EXCEL')), IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM',('/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Direct Export Quote&mode=touchless&outputType=None'),(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & '/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Direct Export Quote&mode=touchless&outputType=None'))) ),null),null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Export Quote field will be displayed in Quote Actions Lightning Components
CustomField.label: Export Quote Button Field
